This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Supports passive option on addEventListener only
FAIL preventDefault should be ignored if-and-only-if the passive option is true document is not defined
PASS returnValue should be ignored if-and-only-if the passive option is true
FAIL passive behavior of one listener should be unaffected by the presence of other listeners document is not defined
PASS Equivalence of option values
Harness: the test ran to completion.
